short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings back both clickable map thumbnails & the "Maps" tab to Google results, which have been disabled for european users.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is bringing back both clickable map thumbnails & the "Maps" tab to Google results, which have been disabled for european users.

===========
CHANGELOG
===========
v1.3.1
Google updated the search result tabs DOM, resulting in the "Maps" tab generation being broken.
This is now fixed.

v1.3.0
Enhancement of the map target address:
When searching for a company, a business, etc, Google is sometimes displaying a side panel including its exact address. We now use it to set the Google Maps "coordinates".

Without it, the extension was sometimes displaying an unzoomed Google Maps with multiple business sharing the same name in the world.

Credits to @RyanB28

Add support to all Google country domains (not only google.com): .fr, .it, etc.

v1.2.2
Google updated the search result DOM for the large interactive map, resulting in this element to not be clickable anymore.
This is now fixed.

v1.2.1
Google updated the search result tabs DOM, resulting in the "Maps" tab generation being broken.
This is now fixed.

v1.2.0
Extension popup overhaul âœ¨.

v1.1.1
Prevent Google Weather widget from opening Google Maps on click in some cases.

v1.1.0
Add "Maps" tab to Google results page.

v1.0.0
Enable Google Maps redirection for:
- Small map thumbnails (e.g. restaurant, theater, etc)
- Big map thumbnails (e.g. address)
- Interactive map


============
SOURCE CODE
============
In an effort to ensure transparency, the extension's source code is available at the following address:
https://github.com/monsieurnebo/chrome-extension-google-results-clickable-map
